name: Pixelscape
description:
----Welcome to Pixelscape. Here you will embark on your pixelated adventure of mining, building, and creating new things, by yourself, or with friends. After countless updates and two sequels, It's a better title than ever before, and still receives updates to make it even more incredible. Its complex features can make it resource intensive, therefore 8GB is recommended for most machines. 

--Latest update: 

v1.15.2 added snow, ice, textures, fixed inventory bug and ice blocks

Controls:

- Use WASD to move around the world.

- Press E to access block catalogue.

- Press Q to interact with certain tiles.

- Press R to rotate tiles.

- Press 1 to enter build mode

- Press 2 to enter break mode

- Click on tiles to create or destroy them.
